item.title: Script to Chart Intervals Between Problem and Recovery from Nagios/Icinga Log Files
item.description: At work, we use Icinga (a fork of Nagios) for monitoring. We have a few services which are restarted or otherwise poked by event handlers, but the recovery takes a while - so we often get paged for problems which recover in a few minutes. I wrote a small perl script …
